Text.Page:
I'm devising new ways to fight the arachnensâ€”hopefully before they become giant slashy killing things.

That means research, so I thought we'd appease two baraka with one scroll.

Head into the Hatchery and collect some of their cocoons. That will give me research subjects and leave the arachnens with fewer fighters. Sound good?

Did you bring me the cocoons? Nicely done!

Hopefully, I can find a way to fight Arachne's children without risking our soldiers' lives!
Cocoons make much easier targets than grown arachnens. Hurry!
